item.title: Reforma Pacifico v4.4 1.54 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 5, 2025

Reforma Pacifico v4.4 1.54 ATS

It includes the city of Zapopan and a Tequilera company outside Tequila in Jalisco, connection between Ameca and Zapopan by Highway 70 and the Macrolibration of Guadalajara, as well as completely new 3D models for this project such as the Macrobus and Akron Stadium among others.

Requires
Reforma
Mega Resources

Compatibility: 1.54.x

Credits: Eblem

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Trucks Skins Pack v1.0 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 5, 2025

The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Trucks Skins Pack v1.0 ATS

The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Truck Skins Pack
The Kenworth Skins pack is been built by The Godfather’s Mods Company and covers over Modded Kenworth Trucks in American Truck Simulator for the T909 / T908 RTA / T609 RTA / T610GTM / T680 SCS Software Truck & T680 Next Gen SCS Software Truck

v1.0 (Release Edition)
The Launch edition has a bunch of skins over a wide range of T Series Kenworth Trucks and work for ATS 1.53 not shore about 1.54 beta as i do not do beta’s

Skins that are in this mod pack are listed below

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
